<h1 align="center">
  Note to Self
</h1>

## Setup

1.  **Clone repository**

1. **Install Gatsby CLI**
     
     Navigate to project directory and install the CLI. Alternativy, check to see if it is already installed.
     ```shell
    cd /my-portfolio
    
    npm install gatsby-cli
    
    gatsby --version
    ```

1.  **Start developing**

    From the project directory, start up the local server.

    ```shell
    cd /my-portfolio
    
    gatsby develop
    ```
    
    Site will now run on `http://localhost:8000`
    
    Edit sources files to start making updates!

1. **Deploy changes with Netlify**

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
